Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the automatic waiver of certain additional penalties for a parking violation if a vehicle owner responds to a notice of violation between forty-five and ninety days of its issuance
Items.MatterName: Automatic waiver of certain additional penalties for a parking violation if a vehicle owner responds to a notice of violation between forty-five and ninety days of its issuance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of curbside overnight truck parking in industrial business zones and to provide for the repeal thereof
Items.MatterName: Creation of curbside overnight truck parking in industrial business zones and to provide for the repeal thereof.
